title: Pinebury Nuyarn Wool Cargo Bibs Pre-Order
content:
Wool apparel company Pinebury just announced the first of its kind: Nuyarn Wool Cargo Bibs. These made in the USA wool cargo bibs are now available for the brand’s small batch pre-order ($278)…

These are the first cycling bib shorts ever made with Nuyarn® merino wool, featuring a proprietary fabric developed exclusively for Pinebury. Compared to traditional wool, Nuyarn offers greater durability, superior stretch and recovery, and dries up to five times faster—all without sacrificing the natural comfort and breathability that make merino ideal for endurance riding.

Made in the USA in small batches, with a focus on quality, performance, and detail. Crafted from natural, renewable, and biodegradable RWS Certified Nuyarn® merino wool—a performance fabric rooted in responsibility.

Specs:

  • Made from proprietary Nuyarn® merino wool, developed exclusively for Pinebury
  • Greater durability, faster drying, and superior stretch vs. traditional wool
  • 220 GSM midweight with great warmth to weight ratio, perfect for year-round wear.
  • Multi-density, 6+ hour high-performance chamois pad made in Italy
  • Supportive, ride-tested fit for endurance riding
  • Two side cargo pockets + one rear pocket for storage
  • 2” internal elastic “Power Grip” leg grippers for a secure, non-restrictive fit
  • RWS Certified merino wool: renewable, biodegradable, and responsibly sourced
  • Made in the USA in small batches
  • Lightweight nylon/elastane mesh bib straps provide breathability, soft stretch, and all-day comfort.

See more at Pinebury.
